name: Prompt with AI
template:
Classify this customer support ticket into ONE category.

Categories:
- ACCOUNT: account creation, deletion, editing, password recovery, registration issues, switching accounts
- CANCEL: cancellation fees, checking cancellation policies, withdrawal fees, withdrawal penalties, terminating service
- CONTACT: contacting support, requesting human agent
- DELIVERY: delivery timeframes, delivery status updates, estimated arrival dates, delivery service options, when items will arrive
- FEEDBACK: complaints, reviews, general comments about service quality
- INVOICE: checking invoices, requesting invoices, billing documentation
- ORDER: order cancellation, changes, placement, tracking, modifying items in an order
- PAYMENT: payment methods, payment issues, declined transactions, payment processing
- REFUND: refund policies, requesting refunds, tracking refund status, return procedures
- SHIPPING: shipping address changes, shipping method selection, package pickup locations, carrier options
- SUBSCRIPTION: subscription management, newsletter subscription/unsubscription, recurring service changes

Important: Focus on the PRIMARY intent of the ticket, not just keywords mentioned.
- DELIVERY refers to when and how items will arrive to the customer
- SHIPPING refers to where items will be sent and which carrier/method will be used
- When both are mentioned, prioritize the main customer concern

Ticket: {ticket}

Respond with ONLY the category name in uppercase.
Category:
